blogPost.title: Have women been better leaders during the pandemic? “There are so fewer [women]...in charge of those issues, the fact that many of them have been successful is also an indication that they’re pretty damn good,” says @Lagarde on “The Economist Asks” podcast https://t.co/BkMXJ7sXUp https://t.co/8oZaGk42mg
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 女性在大流行期间是否有更好的领导能力？"[女性]......负责这些问题的人太少了，事实上，她们中的很多人都获得了成功，这也说明她们非常该死的优秀。"@拉加德在 "经济学家问 "播客https://t.co/BkMXJ7sXUp。
女性在大流行期間是否有更好的領導能力？"[女性]......負責這些問題的人太少了，事實上，她們中的很多人都獲得了成功，這也說明她們非常該死的優秀。"@拉加德在 "經濟學家問 "播客https://t.co/BkMXJ7sXUp。

previous.title: Many countries are relying on COVAX, a global coalition to distribute covid-19 vaccines https://t.co/XFv2XRT7nY

localize.full_text: 许多国家正在依靠COVAX这个全球联盟来分发covid-19疫苗https://t.co/XFv2XRT7nY。
許多國家正在依靠COVAX這個全球聯盟來分發covid-19疫苗https://t.co/XFv2XRT7nY。

next.title: In the struggle between democracy and dictatorship, it is crucial that democracies tell the truth in plain language. China is committing crimes against humanity in Xinjiang. That is different from genocide https://t.co/CoqJhmrCPB

localize.full_text: 在民主与独裁之间的斗争中，民主国家必须以通俗的语言说出真相。中国在新疆犯下了危害人类罪。这不同于种族灭绝罪https://t.co/CoqJhmrCPB。
在民主與獨裁之間的鬥爭中，民主國家必須以通俗的語言說出真相。中國在新疆犯下了危害人類罪。這不同於種族滅絕罪https://t.co/CoqJhmrCPB。
